name: Sala_Vindako
content:
Sala Vindako was a female Human who owned a caravan of exotic beasts on the planet Weik.
A skilled huntress and a trainer of wild beasts, Sala Vindako lived her entire life on the backwater world of Weik, where access to technology common throughout the galaxy was limited. Portly yet agile, Vindako dressed in a thick leather coat adorned with animal teeth. During her career, she worked with her employee, Orl Miscord, to capture a dust-stalker in the Madlands. When rumor got out that Vindako was in possession of the legendary Grimoire of Syclos the Lame, Miscord released the dust-stalker in hopes that it would kill Vindako so that he might take possession of the ancient book.
